name: "Starcraft in a browser"
blurb: We're out to build the world's best browser-based real-time strategy game

rewards.reward: You'll get 2 VIP ACTIVATION CODES giving you and a friend exclusive battle units available only to early backers (units will not affect game balance). We'll also send you a FULL CAPACITY RESOURCE BOOST you can use to trick out your outpost, expand your robot armies or wage some serious battle.\r\n\r\nMost importantly, you'll be part of the Mars Frontier gaming community in its earliest days--a pioneer among pioneers!

All previous rewards + YOUR NAME COMMEMORATED in the Mars Frontier game credits listed as a "Contributor". Plus, you'll receive a total of 4 VIP ACTIVATION CODES to share with friends and family. Invite them to play the game you helped make possible.

All previous rewards + Downloadable CONCEPT ART AND BACKSTORY BOOK showing evolution of concepts, original sketches, exclusive backstory, and interviews with game designers. Plus, you'll receive a total of 5 VIP ACTIVATION CODES to share with friends and family.

All previous rewards + HAVE YOUR NAME INTEGRATED INTO THE GAME as the name of a location, character, unit, building, base or weapon. You'll be as famous as any of the other Mars references, like Olympus Mons and the Hellas Impact Basin. If relevant, we can even add a picture of your general likeness in the game itself. Brag to your friends about being immortalized.

All previous rewards + MARS FRONTIER BOXED SET including game book and limited edition frameable game poster (if shipping to non-US location is required, please add $15). Also, have YOUR NAME COMMEMORATED in the Mars Frontier game credits as well as the Concept Art and Backstory Book, listed as a "Sponsor". Plus, you'll receive a total of 10 VIP ACTIVATION CODES to share with friends and family.

All previous rewards + PREMIUM COLLECTOR'S EDITION BOXED VERSION which includes postcards, a scramble puzzle, plus an exclusive Level 1 Ironside commemorative coin. The premium box replaces the standard box (if shipping to non-US location is required, please add $15). Plus, you'll receive a total of 15 VIP ACTIVATION CODES to share with friends and family.

All previous rewards + YOUR PORTRAIT IN GAME. Your handsome face will grace the pixels of Mars Frontier. Send us a high resolution photo of yourself and our artists will turn it into a digital painting that we'll both send to you, and use in-game. Imagine the surprise of your friends as the progress through the game and suddenly--"What? What did I just see? Did he... was that? ..."

All previous rewards + CAMEO APPEARANCE in game trailer, video clips or perhaps even a movie based on the video game. We'll embed you, your name, or your likeness in video format available on the web for friends and family to see. It'll be fun, it'll be rare, it'll be memorable. Why not?

All previous rewards + COLLABORATE ON GAME DESIGN. We'll show you from the bottom up how Mars Frontier is made. We'll give you and end-to-end tour of our entire development process and have you involved in the design of a NEW BOSS to be used in the actual game. Meeting takes place either in Mountain View, California, or via Skype.

All previous rewards + BE A BOSS. We'll turn YOU into a pivotal part of the Mars Frontier Saga. Working from your likeness, our artists will immortalize you as a character in the game story. Why battle your friends one at a time, when you can crush thousands of opponents in a day as they struggle to pass the level you helped design?
